creator: amit.malpure@sungard.com
text: When I have opened an xlsx file using code "workBook = new XSSFWorkbook(fileInputStream)", and externally I try to change the file using ms excel, it throws error like access denied!.
It works fine if I convert file format to xls.
creator: amit.malpure@sungard.com
amit.malpure@sungard.com
text:
Issue resolved when used 3.8 jar.

Thanks
